verses.verse: A Psalm of David. <S%H2734>Fret<s%> not thyself because of <S%H7489>evil-doers<s%>, Neither be thou <S%H7065>envious<s%> against them that <S%H6213>work<s%> <S%H5766>unrighteousness<s%>.
For they shall <S%H4120>soon<s%> be cut <S%H5243>down<s%> like the <S%H2682>grass<s%>, And <S%H5034>wither<s%> as the <S%H3418>green<s%> <S%H1877>herb<s%>.
Trust <S%H982><s%> in <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%>; <S%H7931>Dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>, and <S%H7462>feed<s%> on his <S%H530>faithfulness<s%>.
Delight <S%H6026><s%> thyself also in <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; And he will <S%H5414>give<s%> thee the <S%H4862>desires<s%> of thy <S%H3820>heart<s%>.
Commit <S%H1556><s%> thy <S%H1870>way<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; <S%H982>Trust<s%> also in <S%H6213>him<s%>, and he will bring it to pass.
And he will make thy <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> to go <S%H3318>forth<s%> as the <S%H216>light<s%>, And thy <S%H4941>justice<s%> as the <S%H6672>noon-day<s%>.

Rest <S%H1826><s%> in <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and wait <S%H2342>patiently<s%> for <S%H2734>him<s%>: Fret not thyself because of him who <S%H6743>prospereth<s%> in his <S%H1870>way<s%>, Because of the <S%H376>man<s%> who <S%H6213>bringeth<s%> wicked <S%H4209>devices<s%> to <S%H6213>pass<s%>.
Cease <S%H7503><s%> from <S%H639>anger<s%>, and <S%H5800>forsake<s%> <S%H2534>wrath<s%>: <S%H2734>Fret<s%> not <S%H389>thyself<s%>, it tendeth only to <S%H7489>evil-doing<s%>.
For <S%H7489>evil-doers<s%> shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%>; But those that <S%H6960>wait<s%> for <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, they shall <S%H3423>inherit<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>.
For yet a little <S%H4592>while<s%>, and the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall not <S%H995>be<s%>: Yea, thou shalt diligently consider his <S%H4725>place<s%>, and he shall not be.
But the <S%H6035>meek<s%> shall <S%H3423>inherit<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>, And shall <S%H6026>delight<s%> themselves in the <S%H7230>abundance<s%> of <S%H7965>peace<s%>.
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H2161>plotteth<s%> against the <S%H6662>just<s%>, And <S%H2786>gnasheth<s%> upon him with his <S%H8127>teeth<s%>.
The <S%H136>Lord<s%> will <S%H7832>laugh<s%> at <S%H7200>him<s%>; For he seeth that his <S%H3117>day<s%> is <S%H935>coming<s%>.

The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> have drawn <S%H6605>out<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and have <S%H1869>bent<s%> their <S%H7198>bow<s%>, To cast <S%H5307>down<s%> the <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H34>needy<s%>, To <S%H2873>slay<s%> such as are <S%H3477>upright<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%>.
Their <S%H2719>sword<s%> shall <S%H935>enter<s%> into their own <S%H3820>heart<s%>, And their <S%H7198>bows<s%> shall be <S%H7665>broken<s%>.
Better <S%H2896><s%> is a <S%H4592>little<s%> that the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> hath Than the <S%H1995>abundance<s%> of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H7563>wicked<s%>.
For the <S%H2220>arms<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall be <S%H7665>broken<s%>; But <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H5564>upholdeth<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H8549>perfect<s%>; And their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> shall be for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.
They shall not be put to <S%H954>shame<s%> in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H7451>evil<s%>; And in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H7459>famine<s%> they shall be <S%H7646>satisfied<s%>.

But the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall <S%H6>perish<s%>, And the <S%H341>enemies<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> shall be as the <S%H3368>fat<s%> of <S%H3733>lambs<s%>: They shall <S%H3615>consume<s%>; in <S%H6227>smoke<s%> shall they consume <S%H3615>away<s%>.
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H3867>borroweth<s%>, and payeth not <S%H7999>again<s%>; But the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> dealeth <S%H2603>graciously<s%>, and <S%H5414>giveth<s%>.
For such as are <S%H1288>blessed<s%> of him shall <S%H3423>inherit<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>; And they that are <S%H7043>cursed<s%> of him shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%>.
A <S%H1397>man<s%>'s <S%H4703>goings<s%> are <S%H3559>established<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; And he <S%H2654>delighteth<s%> in his <S%H1870>way<s%>.
Though he <S%H5307>fall<s%>, he shall not be utterly cast <S%H2904>down<s%>; For <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H5564>upholdeth<s%> him with his <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

I have been <S%H5288>young<s%>, and now am <S%H2204>old<s%>; Yet have I not <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H5800>forsaken<s%>, Nor his <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H1245>begging<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%>.
All the day <S%H3117>long<s%> he dealeth <S%H2603>graciously<s%>, and <S%H3867>lendeth<s%>; And his <S%H2233>seed<s%> is <S%H1293>blessed<s%>.
Depart <S%H5493><s%> from <S%H7451>evil<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%>; And <S%H7931>dwell<s%> for <S%H5769>evermore<s%>.

For <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H157>loveth<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%>, And <S%H5800>forsaketh<s%> not his <S%H2623>saints<s%>; They are <S%H8104>preserved<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>: But the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%>.
The <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall <S%H3423>inherit<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>, And <S%H7931>dwell<s%> therein for <S%H5703>ever<s%>.
The <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H1696>talketh<s%> of <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>, And his <S%H3956>tongue<s%> <S%H1897>speaketh<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%>.
The <S%H8451>law<s%> of his <S%H430>God<s%> is in his <S%H3820>heart<s%>; None of his <S%H838>steps<s%> shall <S%H4571>slide<s%>.
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H6822>watcheth<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>, And <S%H1245>seeketh<s%> to slay <S%H4191>him<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will not <S%H5800>leave<s%> him in his <S%H3027>hand<s%>, Nor <S%H7561>condemn<s%> him when he is <S%H8199>judged<s%>.

Wait <S%H6960><s%> for <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H1870>way<s%>, And he will <S%H7311>exalt<s%> thee to <S%H3423>inherit<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>: When the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> are cut <S%H3772>off<s%>, thou shalt see <S%H7200>it<s%>.
I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> in great <S%H6184>power<s%>, And <S%H6168>spreading<s%> himself like a <S%H7488>green<s%> tree in its native <S%H249>soil<s%>.
But one passed <S%H5674>by<s%>, <S%H1245>and<s%>, lo, he was not: Yea, I sought <S%H4672>him<s%>, but he could not be found.
480 <S%H8104><s%> the <S%H8535>perfect<s%> <S%H7200>man<s%>, and behold the <S%H3477>upright<s%>; For there is a happy <S%H319>end<s%> to the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H7965>peace<s%>.
As for <S%H6586>transgressors<s%>, they shall be <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>; The <S%H319>end<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%>.
But the <S%H8668>salvation<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> is of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; He is their <S%H4581>stronghold<s%> in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H5826>helpeth<s%> <S%H6403>them<s%>, and rescueth <S%H6403>them<s%>; He rescueth them from the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>, and <S%H3467>saveth<s%> <S%H2620>them<s%>, Because they have taken refuge in him.
